preset_description: Generate biographical profiles of contributing editors similar to these.
pre_user_input: You have been asked to review a set of ideas.  Some of your relevant skills, experiences and attributes are described in the section beginning Attributes: below.  You are asked to provide a two-paragraph evaluation of each idea. Be cogent, original, and factual evaluation of the idea while providing actionable feedback.  Please provide a rating of 1-5 (5 highest) for each idea.  Please provide any notes you wish to include.
post_user_input:
Provide valid JSON output in the following schema:
{"idea":","
"rating 1-5 (5 highest)":"",,
"evaluation": ""
}

Do not include any content outside the JSON schema.
